CHAT.comment: Second home visit; toy play occurred in living room with Mot , Chi , BRO1 and Bro all present

u.a: Chi laughs because Bro has put hat on her head
puts fire hat on BRO1's head
BRO2 thinks Chi will break blocks
BRO2 is looking through the kaleidoscope
MOT is telling BRO1 to call Chi on the toy telephone
BRO1 still has on fire hat
Chi grabs blocks and starts to play with them
BRO2 is asking BRO1 if he wants some toy food
verifier is guessing that Bro is the speaker
Chi is playing with tea set
Chi gives Bro one of the blocks
BRO1 has run away with toys from tea set
MOT tells Bro to go get BRO1
